column2:
Q1. Do the layers on the Heat Map make sense to you? 
•        E.g., What information do you find useful and why?
•        E.g., What information do you find confusing on the Heat Map and why?
column3: Q2: What information do you think is missing in the Heat Map? How would this information help you learn about the heat situation in your neighborhood?
column4: Q3: Where do you currently go for information about heat (waves)? And how do you usually learn about extremely hot weather?
column5: Q4: During very hot days, how do you stay cool and safe?
column6: Q5: Would you plan to use the Heat Map we presented? If so, how would you use it in your everyday life? If not, what is the reason that you will not use it?
column7: Q6: There will be opportunities for you to participate in conversations about how to reduce the impacts of extreme heat in Madison. How would you like to be part of it?
